Articles.Content: i need a download to every (VAB) stock craft file (the ones that come with KSP) and the ones from the expansion (also come with KSP DLCS) thanks

7 minutes ago, Hadron27 said:

i need a download to every (VAB) stock craft file (the ones that come with KSP) and the ones from the expansion (also come with KSP DLCS) thanks 

If you wish to have those craft, just enable ‘allow stock craft’ when you create a new save. If not, I’m sure you can find them on kerbalx.

4 minutes ago, Lewie said:

If you wish to have those craft, just enable ‘allow stock craft’ when you create a new save. If not, I’m sure you can find them on kerbalx.

the problem is i had Bluedog Design Bureau installed and i had the craft files installed and now for whatever reason they're stuck in the game even if i delete the files

i cant play ksp probably because of these files being heavily corrupted

please help i cant delete these stupid craft files
I can't help you with that problem, but I can move your question to the sub where someone else might. Good luck.
